item.description:
It was late in May of 2009 and an Assistant Organizer of a South Shore-based dining group was facing the usual question: Where to bring the group?!

He found an answer in a West Bridgewater institution called Crispi's Italian Cuisine. Run by chef-owner Crispi Falconeiri and his family since 1985, Crispi's had long been known for its surprisingly extensive menu featuring Italian classics as well as some less common variations on the Italian theme.

Our visit almost three years ago was a success and we feel that this is one of those "been there forever" spots that is still around for a reason and is worth a revisit. We will be heading there at 7:00 PM on Tuesday, May 29th and hope that a few of you will join us in our continuing celebration of friendship, tradition, and red sauce.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Crispi's Italian Cuisine

136 Broad Street (Rte 18),

Bridgewater, MA

(508) 697-6733

http://www.crispisrestaurant.com/index.html

 

Organizers: Mike and Alison

Min/Max: None at this time.

Guests: Yes. Up to two per member.

Price Range: Half-a-dozen pasta dishes come with a house salad and cost $12.00 or less. The majority of entrees run between $15.00 - $18.00, with the menu topping out at $24.00 for a surf & turf.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Event Fee: No Event Fee for current Annual Members. Other Members and Guests: $2.00

RSVP Deadline: Monday, May 28th at 7:00 PM.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions: Crispi's is located on Broad St (Route 18) in Bridgewater, at the point where railroad tracks intersect the road directly across from a strip mall/plaza w/ Roche Brothers, Dunkin Donuts and Burger King.

From the North: The best route to take is Route 18 South. Follow through East Bridgewater Center, past the movie theather, past a couple sets of lights and into Bridgewater Center. It is about 1/4 mile before the Bridgewater Center Rotary across from a strip mall on the right.

From Route 24: Take Exit 16 off Route 24 towards Bridgewater. Follow all the way to the intersection of Route 18. following Route 18 into Bridgewater Center. Crispi's is about 1/4 mile before the Bridgewater Center Rotary across from a strip mall on the right.

From the South: Take Route 18 North thru Bridgewater Center. Crispi's is about 1/4 mile north of (or after) the Bridgewater Center Rotary across from a strip mall on the left.

From Route 3: Take the Weymouth Exit (16) towards Route 18 South. Follow directions 'From the North' as noted above.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Still Crispi's After All These Years
